name: hearth
description: Hearth, a home for FHIR. A fast FHIR-compliant server.

scripts.test: npm run test:code && npm -s run test:style
scripts.test:load: npm run test:load-create && npm run test:load-matching && npm run test:clean-db
scripts.test:load-matching: NODE_ENV=test npm start -- --createIndexes & sleep 2 && artillery run -o artillery/load-matching.json test/load-tests/matching.yml && npm stop && artillery report artillery/load-matching.json
scripts.test:load-create: NODE_ENV=test npm start -- --createIndexes & sleep 2 && artillery run -o artillery/load-create.json test/load-tests/create.yml && npm stop && artillery report artillery/load-create.json

author: Jembi Health Systems NPC
